column5: TTWO Buy targeting 150 This stock is very different to EA and Activision There is no loot box revenue huge at EA the cashflow is compounding at 20pc there is not a big contribution from deferred revenues there is no debt on balance sheet lumpy debt at Activision and its two big titles suit the online subscription model perfectly The strong outperformance will continue
